subtitles:
54054 57224 SARAH: People once believed
that when someone dies,

57307 60978 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

65107 69611 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it, and the soul can't rest.

73532 77911 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.

101018 104813 -OFFICER: I got one here.
-(RADIO CHATTER CONTINUES)

104896 107816 -(EXHALES)
-Sir, this is all we got checked on.

137763 140891 OFFICER: Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?
148649 150776 All right, guys. Let's do it.

150859 154237 Devil's fucking Night.
What's the count so far?
155739 157532 They're slacking off from last year.

157616 160410 Three hours to go.
Maybe they're just slow starters.

167542 169854 but you guys just can't come in here
and take her away like this.

169878 173757 There are procedures to stick by. You guys
should have cleared this with me first.

174508 176843 -Is this the victim?
-No, it's Amelia Earhart.

176927 178607 We found her, Detective,
and you missed it.

178637 181807 I don't care what her name is.
I didn't give the order to move her.

182724 185227 Jesus, Albrecht. I can see why
they took away your gold shield.

185310 187521 Yeah, I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.

189356 191316 -(CAWS)
-DETECTIVE: All right. Clear out of here.

197364 200325 -SHELLY: Where's Eric?
-Just don't worry about him.
202619 204579 Tell him to take care of Sarah.

204663 207999 Look, I will. You just lie back.
Come on. Come on.

220637 224683 Yeah, look.
Your sister, she's gonna be okay.

224766 229062 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
235110 236945 You lied to her about Eric.
239364 241324 And you're lying to me about Shelly.

260135 262929 -OFFICER: Get public service in here.
-She's gonna be fine.

286536 288789 I used to think
that was true about everything.

293502 297380 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real,

297464 301927 two people who are meant to be together--
nothing can keep them apart.
340257 342133 What are you, like, the night watchman?

364781 370078 You know, what this place needs
is a good, natural catastrophe.
373623 376042 No, no. Mickey, come on, man.

376126 378086 You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
378169 380463 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
380547 382465 Hey, hey, come on. Let me do it.

387804 391016 Come on. Come on, man.
Don't cheap out on me. Lots of onions.

401526 403695 How do you steer that thing
on a wet street?

405947 409367 See, now, Sarah,
she's a genuine hotdogger. You hungry?

425133 427719 GANG MEMBER: You know,
Lake Erie actually caught on fire once
427802 429971 from all the crap floating around in it.
430639 433892 (EXHALES) I wish I could have seen that.
539372 542208 Fire it up! We busted them machines.
566274 569652 Oh, shit, guys. T-Bird. Cop car. Cop car.
577368 579496 Bad people out on the street tonight.
589881 591758 ALBRECHT: Mickey, call it in for me!

704037 709626 "Abashed the Devil stood
and felt how awful goodness is.
709709 713046 Saw virtue in her shape, how lover--"

727602 729687 -No, no, no, no. Me first.
-(SHELLY WHIMPERING)

784492 787245 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?

791874 795962 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favorite holiday.

799966 801968 You need to go over there
and talk to your pals.

805930 808891 Are you out of
your motherfucking mind, man?
825366 827577 That shit ain't even loaded, man.

830538 836627 Which of you Motor City motherfuckers
wants to bet me this one isn't?

851142 853227 -Put your guns away, huh, guys?
-How you doing?
966215 969010 ♪ "Oh, it doesn't matter how you hide" ♪

974307 976809 ♪ "So slide back down
And close your eyes" ♪
1016557 1018809 TIN TIN: Couple more rings. That's 24K.
1020228 1023439 It's 18K. It's crap. It's probably fake.

1029195 1031948 What is this, Tin Tin?
A bloodstain that's on here?

1034992 1037620 I'll give you 50 bucks.
And I hate charities.
1037703 1039914 Now, you can take it or leave it.
1056222 1057723 Close the gate when you go out!

1057807 1060935 Oh, I close this up for you
real good, mass a.
1064730 1067066 Yeah, sit on it and twirl, you dirty scum.

1071779 1074198 TIN TIN: You're lucky
I don't stab your fat ass.
1097013 1101267 ♪ That point me to another day ♪

1180721 1184392 What the fuck you all painted up for,
crackhead. Huh? (CHUCKLES)

1236736 1239613 I didn't murder nobody, man.
I don't even fucking know you, man.
1239697 1241115 What the fuck you want, man?
1241198 1243492 I want you to tell me a story.
1243576 1245786 A man and a woman in a loft a year ago.

1249582 1254545 I'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them on Halloween.
1256839 1259049 Some dude, some bitch-- Whatever, man.
1262219 1265014 You cut her. You raped her.
1266766 1270269 I shanked her pink ass, and she loved it!
1281655 1284033 Murder? Let me tell you about murder.
1287203 1289955 You gonna learn all about it.
1294627 1297213 I'd like you to meet two buddies of mine.
1333541 1338879 ♪ Sometimes it rains inside my head ♪

1347304 1350349 Look at this mess.
What's the world coming to?
1356814 1359483 ♪ No, they don't have to take you... ♪

1359567 1361735 I got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.
1361819 1366407 ♪ No, they don't have to take you away ♪
1366490 1368993 Get out of my way, you worms!
1369076 1371370 ♪ No, they don't have to take you away ♪
1371453 1372872 Give me some of that over there.

1375249 1377751 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.
1380546 1383632 Arcade Games fell down, went boom.
1384800 1387553 Can you imagine that? It's tragic.

1388429 1392391 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1392474 1395144 -Is the man in?
-He's taking a meeting.

1438812 1442733 He said, "Childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die."
1481355 1487486 ♪ No, they don't have to take you away ♪

1493325 1496286 DRIVER: Hey, kid,
get the hell out of the road!
1502793 1507506 ♪ I don't hate them, but I know them ♪
1507589 1512511 ♪ I don't want them hanging around ♪
1512594 1515806 ♪ I won't roll my bones for every... ♪
1519101 1521270 I told you to stay out of here.

1521353 1525149 So I guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1527067 1529236 Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?

1535159 1538162 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1538245 1543667 ♪ I thought I had no choice
But then I kissed her ♪

1543751 1546462 MOCKING: "Somebody already
bought me dinner. The police."
1562561 1564980 Who the fuck is this now?

1572029 1575866 Go sleep it off somewhere else, dust head,
unless you want to get mutilated.
1580496 1582623 I'm gonna blow this guy's dick off.

1583832 1586710 Goddamn creatures of the night.
They never learn.

1598806 1602768 as if someone gently rapping--
rapping at my chamber door."
1605187 1607106 What the fuck are you talking about?
1612986 1615030 and you owe me a fucking new door!

1617449 1620452 I'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.
1633757 1636301 Shit on me. Shit on me!
1643392 1645686 Mr. Gideon, you're not paying attention.
1653610 1657739 I repeat: A gold engagement ring, yes?

1658615 1662578 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1666373 1668917 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.
1674006 1675966 So who's this sack of shit?

1676049 1679303 That's Tin Tin,
one of T-Bird's little helpers.
1679386 1681805 I think you can rule out accidental death.

1681889 1685309 (CHUCKLES) Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?
1685392 1687144 This could be a turf hit,

1687227 1689313 but it doesn't look like
your usual gang crap.
1691273 1694359 You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.
1694443 1696361 I'm supposed to thank you for that, right?

1696987 1700199 Word to the wise:
Watch your fucking mouth.
1701408 1703202 What the hell do you call that?
1707539 1710792 I suppose you'll write it up as graffiti.
1710876 1714129 You can leave my crime scene now, okay?

1723889 1726516 -Don't you know this game?
-What game are you talking about?

1727100 1729478 All right, the rings!
I'll tell you about the rings!

1729561 1732606 They're in that metal box.
It's under the shelf there.
1734399 1736401 Take them. Take the fucking rings!

1736485 1739738 You can chew them and you can
choke on them, you son of a bitch!

1743158 1745744 -Look, it goes up to the attic.
-Okay.
1764346 1766640 It's beautiful. I don't believe it.

1790706 1793625 -You have one chance to live.
-Look, man, take anything you want.

1798088 1801925 Now you're gonna tell me where to find
the rest of Tin Tin's little party pals.
1802009 1803927 The Pit. They all hang out at The Pit.

1804011 1806722 All of T-Bird's little potato heads
hang out there.

1806805 1809057 Funboy, he lives there, upstairs,
all right?

1823739 1827617 -Each one of these is a life.
-(RINGS CLATTERING)
1830287 1832873 I'm begging you, all right. Don't kill me.

1836710 1840881 Your job will be to tell the rest of them
that death is coming for them.
1849473 1851975 Tell them Eric Draven sends his regards.

1855562 1859149 You walk out of here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass!

1859733 1861568 You're nothing but street grease,
you hear?

1887386 1890514 -(JUKEBOX POWERS UP)
-On the house, kiddo. You know that.

1898522 1902984 Your mom, technically,
she's off right now.

1915747 1917791 I thought the police always said,
"Freeze."

1917874 1920544 Well, I am the police,
and I say don't move, Snow White.
1923213 1927050 And I say I'm dead and I move.
1927717 1930429 Not one more step. I'm serious.
1930512 1934850 Then shoot, if you will, Officer Albrecht.
1934933 1938061 What are you, nuts? Walking into a gun?

1943108 1947195 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?
1949906 1951825 I want you to move over to the curb there.
1951908 1953535 Come on, real nice and easy.
1957497 1959040 We're gonna wait here for backup.
1959958 1961877 It's getting too frigging weird for me.

1962669 1966465 Oh, it gets better.
Do you know someone named T-Bird?

1966548 1969384 He had a friend
who shouldn't have played with knives.
1971303 1972888 You're the guy that murdered Tin Tin.

1978643 1981146 He died a year ago,
the moment he touched her.

1983482 1986651 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.

1989237 1991781 -THIEF 1: Cops!
-THIEF 2: Come on. Get out of here!

1992282 1994993 -(THIEF 3 LAUGHS)
-THIEF 4: Leave it. Leave it. Run!

2005170 2007088 Guy shows up
looking like a mime from hell,
2007172 2010091 and you lose him right out in the open.

2012219 2015430 at least he didn't do
that walking-against-the-wind shit.
2016598 2018238 OFFICER: Little early for Devil's Night.
2018975 2020519 What the hell is going on here?

2024606 2027859 I just wish I was a little hungry again,
that's all.

2027943 2031655 -Be careful what you ask for.
-Yeah, you may get it. I know.
2043833 2046920 There are energies aligning against you.

2068525 2072487 Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.
2072571 2075073 Nobody cleared this little event with me.

2075156 2079619 -I didn't have nothing to do with that.
-I'm sure you must be awful disappointed.

2079703 2083873 I got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

2083957 2086251 -Yeah? And who might that be?
-Tin Tin.

2086334 2090880 Somebody stuck his blades in all
his major organs in alphabetical order.

2092591 2096428 I think we ought to have an introspective
moment of silence for poor old Tin Tin.

2098888 2102017 (SIGHS) You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?
2102100 2104894 Whatever you say, I can do.

2107063 2110609 I still ain't heard the story
on why Gideon's burned down.

2111818 2116072 Is that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2116156 2118325 (SNIFFS) Call it my need to know.
2166790 2169000 He was a butt face. I could have made it.

2171169 2173713 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?
2178385 2180637 It's more like surfing than skating.
2180720 2182764 I wish the rain would stop, just once.
2183848 2185809 It can't rain all the time.
2208039 2209416 Are we fighting the good fight?

2209499 2213211 (SIGHS) Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.

2218341 2222470 "We, the undersigned tenants
of 1929 Caulderon Court apartments--"

2223847 2226725 A big kick-me sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause,
2226808 2228268 and a cause that got her killed.

2228351 2230895 She was fighting tenant eviction
in that neighborhood?

2230979 2236109 {\an8}Shelly Webster and her
nice rock-and-roll boyfriend Eric Draven.

2236192 2238778 {\an8}You know, the last time
you went snooping around on a case

2238862 2241531 -is when you got put back on the beat.
-Yeah, I know.

2241614 2244576 -Torres keeps reminding me.
-(CHUCKLES) I bet he does.

2252542 2255295 You're gonna wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2256546 2259007 -I'm cool.
-You didn't get that file from me, okay?
2259090 2261676 And don't tell me you owe me one.

2294667 2298379 Tomorrow night... (GASPS)
...we can-- we can get high

2298463 2302300 and watch this whole fucking city burn
from that window.

2326449 2329786 (CHUCKLES)
There's a big fucking bird over there.
2357021 2359023 ♪ Streets of gold, streets of gold ♪
2369742 2371911 You nearly gave me a fucking heart attack!

2378877 2382547 It's time for you to take your bird
and leave, freako.
2400732 2402233 Did you look in the mirror?
2402317 2405403 I mean, you need professional help.

2425798 2429552 "Jesus Christ."
Stop me if you heard this one.
2429636 2431888 Jesus Christ walks into a hotel.

2437477 2440730 He hands the innkeeper three nails
and he asks--
2444442 2446235 "Can you put me up for the night?"

2458998 2462794 (STRAINED VOICE)
Look what you've done to my sheets.
2487318 2489278 I've got a gun in my pocket.
2492156 2493950 You're happy to see me, aren't you?
2512760 2516681 Stay away! Stay away from me! (SOBS)

2528359 2532905 "Mother is the name for God

2549338 2552633 Your daughter is out there on the streets

2606395 2608481 You burn yourself playing with matches?

2617281 2619075 Get my friend here a glass of blood.

2689103 2691939 The fire that was won

2692023 2693941 but lost the lives of two firefighters.

the constant surveillance
2701699 2704035 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.

2716380 2717632 You still have your hat on.
2733439 2737777 are you some kind of... a ghost?
2747411 2749330 I don't know what I am.
2749413 2751958 I need you to tell me what happened to us.

2753834 2757296 Well, you took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2758047 2761217 She, uh, was beaten and raped.
2765972 2767682 I mean, come on. Read the file.

2768432 2773020 Shelly Webster held on for 30 hours
in intensive care,
2773104 2775481 and her body finally just gave it up.
2776190 2778859 I saw it, man. I couldn't do jack for her.
2804593 2806679 I saw her through your eyes.
2807972 2809724 You stayed with her the whole time.

2809807 2814603 Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

2815730 2820026 I was-- I was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

2820109 2823571 -Give me something I could work with.
-(LIGHTER CLICKS)
2828451 2830953 Why didn't you do something about it?

2831037 2832877 You think any of those people
in that building,

2832955 2836167 even the ones who signed the petition,
would talk after what happened to you?

2841047 2843924 and finally got busted for
sticking my nose where it wasn't wanted.

2859231 2862985 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.
2863069 2865404 I used to think they were kind of trivial.
2889053 2891972 Are you gonna vanish into thin air again?
2896018 2898312 I thought I'd use your front door.

2904360 2907196 I'm sorry as hell for what happened
to you and your girlfriend.

2919208 2922169 GIDEON: I got stabbed.
I shot the son of a bitch.
2922253 2924505 I watched the bullet hole close by itself.

2924588 2927425 And then I heard that my business
gets blown up real good.
2931303 2934056 I saw him too. He had a guitar.

2934140 2938561 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

2945109 2948189 So far I haven't heard shit about what
you're going to do about all this crap.
2948237 2949738 I mean, what do I get?

2949822 2953159 My livelihood,
it got flushed away and went swirling.

2957288 2960624 Yeah, and maybe
you're not such a big shot either!

2969175 2972094 Say hello to the last fella
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

2972178 2974114 What, are you telling me--
you're telling me this thing is real?

2974138 2977641 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

2977725 2980728 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

2981979 2985441 You know, you're directly
out of your fucking mind! You know that?

2991155 2994116 It's one of the most important things
I learned from my sister.

2994200 2996952 Sister? She's supposed to be
your sister? (LAUGHS)

3000789 3002709 What's the matter?
You don't see the resemblance?

3004502 3008589 Now, let's take it from the top, friend.
And a lot of detail, huh?

3010049 3013469 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

3013552 3017097 He told me to tell T-Bird
that death was on its way.
3017181 3019391 Whatever the fuck that means. And--
3020142 3023229 Draven. He said his name was Eric Draven.
3024271 3025773 Want to relax that thing now?

3026482 3029818 And this bird man--
He just happened to let you live, huh?

3031237 3034740 You sure you ain't making all of this up
just to save your own ass?
3035533 3037660 I ain't making all this up.
3038369 3041580 I ain't twisted like you two fucks.
3066814 3068691 Oh, for fuck's sake, die, will you?
3078576 3080828 Funboy said he saw a black bird too.
3083914 3086166 Then he choked to death on his own blood.
3087835 3090546 I'll have the janitor come on up.

3186558 3188518 You know how long it took us
to put this together.

3190396 3192231 made Tin Tin into a fucking voodoo doll!

-T-BIRD: Tin Tin...
3197528 3199488 BOTH: Fire it up! Fire it up!
3199571 3201740 Fire it up! Fire it up!
3209331 3212376 Probably still banging away on Darla.
3217756 3220426 Smokes and road beers. Be quick.
3253917 3257171 What the fuck are you supposed to be, man?

3285449 3288702 Oh, shit!
What the fuck's the matter with you?

3299755 3304176 What do you want, man?
Money? Drugs? I got it.
3305803 3308680 We could use you. You did Tin Tin.
3314812 3316647 OFFICER: You got that cream stuff?

3319066 3321485 I hate this.
You can't even call it cream legally.
3329034 3332246 Oh, look. You're making us popular.

3332329 3335123 When they flash us like that,
they ain't friends.

3340712 3343715 This is vehicle 48.
We got us a big, old, red hot rod.

3349721 3354977 You got something personal, amigo,
we can work it out, right? Huh?
3372119 3373745 Oh, my God! Get out of the way!
3402983 3406695 Oh, I hate this. This ain't good.
3408113 3410532 T-Bird! I got you, man. I'm coming.

3427507 3429968 Remember? Yeah, I remember everything.
But I don't know--

3432638 3436099 What? What are you talking about?
No, no, no, no.

3439353 3441273 We needed to put some fear
into that little lady.

3441355 3444650 She wasn't going along with
our tenant relocation program.

3444733 3448236 And her idiot boyfriend shows up
and turns a simple sweep-and-clear

3448320 3450572 -into a total cluster fuck!
-(CAR TRUNK CLOSES)
3450656 3453533 Who gives a shit? It's ancient history.
3455494 3459039 What is it? What? Speak to me. Speak!
3461708 3463585 Did you send us these complaints?

3474137 3477808 I know you. I knew I knew you.
I knew I knew you.

3480519 3482896 You can't be you.
We put you through the window.

3484982 3488110 This is the really real world.
There ain't no coming back.

3488193 3490529 We killed you dead.
There ain't no coming back.

3494658 3498120 There ain't no coming back!
There ain't no coming back!
3508505 3510966 and felt how awful goodness is.

3581244 3583538 REPORTER: This is the 7:00 am. edition
of Action News.

3583622 3586124 For over a decade,
the night before Halloween

3586208 3590378 has had a darker and deadlier nickname
in the inner city, "Devil's Night--"

3590462 3593924 the name given to what has become
an annual plague of arson.

3601056 3604684 of what may become the biggest
and deadliest Devil's Night ever,

3604768 3608271 the mayor has firefighters
from all surrounding counties...

3608355 3612150 Do you like them up or over?
I can't remember.

3614194 3616988 {\an8}What are you doing?
I don't even like eggs.

3622369 3625205 So what do you want now?
Black coffee and cigarettes?

3626206 3629126 So what did you take
to become mother of the year?
3632546 3634714 Someone kind of woke me up.

3641555 3645225 You're acting weird. Did you win
the lottery or something, Darla?
3650605 3652649 I never was too good at this mommy shit.
3657279 3661158 I like them over easy... Mom.

3677883 3680510 This is the third hit
in your hood in 24 hours.

3680594 3683597 We just fished this out of the river.
He's fused to his own car.
3683680 3685849 We're gonna have to ID his teeth.

3689311 3691438 Looks like he zigged
when he should have zagged.

3704826 3707871 I got a goddamn vigilante killer
knocking off scumbags left and right,
3707954 3709394 and you're covering up for somebody.

3711041 3713418 Who's the cartoon character
in the painted face?

3713501 3716171 Hey, you're the detective.
Why don't you tell me?

3716254 3719674 Okay. Gideon's blows all to hell, and
you're having a chitchat with some weirdo

3719758 3722552 who winds up in T-Bird's car
when it zigs instead of zags.

3722636 3725013 Then you steal one of my case files
from homicide,

3725096 3727599 and you're saying this is just
a fucking automobile accident?

3730227 3732107 I didn't want to interrupt you.
It sounded good.
3732145 3733647 You gotta write that shit down.

3736816 3739236 The captain's got
a little love note waiting for you.

3739319 3741947 Welcome to the first day
of the rest of your suspension.
3801923 3804551 SHELLY: One for sorrow, two for joy.

3804634 3807387 -Come here.
-Three for a girl and four for a boy.
3905652 3908446 You said, "Can't rain all the time."
3909406 3911199 That is from your song, right?

3922961 3925672 -(CAWING)
-Come on, Eric. I know you're here.
3935682 3937767 I get so lonely all by myself.
3941604 3944649 To hell with you. I thought you cared.

3963126 3965366 He was all painted up white
like some kind of dead whore.

3965420 3968590 I seen him. T-Bird, he sent me in
for some road beers, right?

3968673 3971092 Then he took him away.
But I chased him down.

3971176 3974095 And he flash-fried T-Bird
to his fucking car!
3974179 3977557 Oh, T-Bird! Here's to you, buddy.

3977640 3981603 Maybe we ought to just videotape this,
play it back in slow motion.
3983146 3985773 Fire it up! Fire it up!

3996618 3999204 He's working his way back
